lead_paragraph: Gonzalo Higuain converted an early penalty for Juventus and then missed a sitter before Olympique Lyonnais hit back late in the game to grab a 1-1 draw in their Champions League match on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Higuain Hero and Villain as Juve Blow Early Lead
headline.main: Higuain Hero and Villain as Juve Blow Early Lead
